metadata.title: CVE-2022-22967 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in SaltStack Salt in versions before 3002.9,3003.5, 3004.2. PAM auth fails to reject locked accounts, which allows apreviously authorized user whose account is locked still run Salt commandswhen their account is locked. This affects both local shell accounts withan active session and salt-api users that authenticate via PAM eauth.

criterions.comment: salt package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
